allow:
Bash(git commit -m "Enable collision on floor and walls

- Add use_collision = true to all CSG shapes (floor, walls, ceiling)
- Fixes player falling through the floor
- Player can now walk on the floor and collide with walls")

Bash(git commit -m "Fix interaction detection for equipment

- Check parent node when raycast hits Area3D children
- Equipment has Area3D children but interaction methods on parent
- Player can now interact with all equipment using E key
- Console output will show interaction results")
